displayName: Application Guard allow use of Root Certificate Authorities from the user's device
description:
If configured, certificates with a thumbprint matching the ones specified will be transferred into the Microsoft Defender Application Guard container. Multiple certificates can be specified by using a comma to separate the thumbprints for each certificate you want to transfer. Example:  b4e72779a8a362c860c36a6461f31e3aa7e58c14,1b1d49f06d2a697a544a1059bd59a7b058cda924

If not configured, certificates are not shared with the Microsoft Defender Application Guard container.
